name: Shooti
description:
An endless procedurally generated apocalyptic co-op driving survival game called Shooti! where you can drive, loot and discover with your friends. Provided with fully functional dedicated server and client.

Features:

- Procedurally generated endless map using an 8-digit seed

- Fully synced co-op experience

- Adjustable server settings

- Dynamic weather and day cycle

- Zombies! + Peacefull mode

- Growing and harvesting weed to make money

- Growing, harvesting and processing coca leaves to make more money

- Base Building

- 2 customizable characters

- 1 fully intractable car to drive around with your friends

- And more stuff to surprise you...!

- (More will come with every update)

Installation:

- Unzip the downloaded file.

- You need to install .NET 6.x to run the game server, you can install the one in prerequisites folder.

- Start the game via Shooti.exe

- You can start a new game with randomized seed or join others game.

- Be sure to give firewall socket permissions for the game server and client while being asked.
